title: verify if system is alive
name: verifyMe

Success 200.description: system status about the platform

examples.title: Success-Response:
Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/verifyMe

Error 4xx.description: Not applicable

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: return all attitude data points
name: getAttitude

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/verifyMe

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/services/v1/attitude

Success 200.description: array of attitude quaternion q1/q2/q3/q4 data points

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{"status":200,"message":"retrieve all attitude data points",
   "data":[{"_id":"56f312e98caf28f687482b5f","vehicleId":"IBEX",
   "timestamp":1457726400,"q1":0.651781,"q2":-0.29526,"q3":-0.268266,"q4":0.645009}]}

Error 4xx.description: internal system error The database is not ready to serve yet, e.g. after restart

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal system error encoutered

{"message":"Internal system error encountered","type":"internal"}

title: return attitude data points from time/to time by vehicleId
name: getAttitude_vehicleId__fromTime__toTime_

Parameter.description: from time period (Unix time in number, e.g. 1457726400)

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/services/v1/attitude/IBEX/10000/1457725800

Success 200.description: array of attitude quaternion q1/q2/q3/q4 data points

Error 4xx.description: internal system error The database is not ready to serve yet, e.g. after restart

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal system error encoutered

{"message":"Internal system error encountered","type":"internal"}

title: return all orbit trajectory data points
name: getOrbit

Success 200.description: array of orbit data points (which are a series of longitude and latitude data points, sometimes like a sine wave)

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    {"status":200,"message":"retrieve all orbit data points",
"data":[{"_id":"56f315e98caf28f687483230","vehicleId":"IBEX","timestamp":1457726400,
"value": [ 10,20...]}]}

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/services/v1/orbit

Error 4xx.description: internal system error The database is not ready to serve yet, e.g. after restart

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal system error encoutered

{"message":"Internal system error encountered","type":"internal"}

title: return vehicle data points from time/to time by vehicleId
name: getVegucke_vehicleId__fromTime__toTime_

Parameter.description: from time period (Unix time in number, e.g. 1457726400)

Success 200.description: array of vehicle data points from sensors in the satellite , e.g. temperature value, warnHigh, alertHigh

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    {"status":200,"message":"retrieve all vehicle data points",
"data":[{"_id":"56f315e98caf28f687483228","vehicleId":"IBEX","timestamp":1457726400,
"value":315,"calibrationFactor":"T = 3*x - 4*x^2 + 2","uom":"Kelvin","alertHigh":330,
"warnHigh":321,"alertLow":280,"warnLow":274,"deviceId":"Battery01Temp"}]}

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -X GET http://localhost:3000/services/v1/vehicle/IBEX/1457726300/1457726400

Error 4xx.description: internal system error The database is not ready to serve yet, e.g. after restart

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 500 Internal system error encoutered

{"message":"Internal system error encountered","type":"internal"}
